alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 12:31PM EDT until September 08 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Windham County in northern Connecticut... Tolland County in northern Connecticut... Southeastern Hartford County in northern Connecticut... * Until 130 PM EDT. * At 1230 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Glastonbury, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Manchester, Glastonbury, Vernon, Mansfield, Rocky Hill, Ellington, Tolland, Coventry, Stafford, Hebron, Thompson, Woodstock, Marlborough, Willington, Columbia, Bolton, Ashford, Pomfret, Andover, and Chaplin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
